title: Steph and KD Get More Attention Than I Do
itunes:title: Steph and KD Get More Attention Than I Do
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been seeing this amazing guy for a few months. We would go out 3 to 4 times a week and I really like spending time with him. I have no children but he has an eight year old son. Things were great between us until the NBA season started. He is a big basketball fan and whenever there’s a game, we have to go to a bar with a lot of TVs so he won’t miss it. I was okay with that at first because I still got to spend time with him...........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been seeing this amazing guy for a few months. We would go out 3 to 4 times a week and I really like spending time with him. I have no children but he has an eight year old son. Things were great between us until the NBA season started. He is a big basketball fan and whenever there’s a game, we have to go to a bar with a lot of TVs so he won’t miss it. I was okay with that at first because I still got to spend time with him...........
